title: Reversed deck trick
text:
A chosen card is lost in the deck. Then, all cards turn over, except the chosen card.

  1. Prepare the deck by secretly flipping the bottom card.
  2. Let the spectator chose a card. As you reveal the card, turn the deck upside down. (Revealing the card acts as a misdirection for turning the deck)
  3. Place the chosen card in the middle of the deck.
  4. Wave over the deck and explain that every card will turn over except the chosen card. 
  5. Flip or remove the top card and show that each card has now turned over, except the chosen card.
